rows.label: bf04370130_0010
rows.name: Masterpon-sama...

rows.label: bf04370130_0015
rows.name:
I apologize for being controlled
by such a device[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf04370130_0020
rows.name:
This one uses "sama" and everything,
she's more polite than Hana, mo[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf04370130_0030
rows.name:
No need for apologies. You come
back, and that enough for me.

rows.label: bf04370130_0040
rows.name: My dear younger sister...  I caused you trouble.

rows.label: bf04370130_0050
rows.name: I'm used to being troubled.

rows.label: bf04370130_0060
rows.name: Who are you talking about, Mo-mo?

rows.label: bf04370130_0070
rows.name: Hana, I have one more favor to ask.

rows.label: bf04370130_0075
rows.name: Our many younger sisters[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf04370130_0080
rows.name:
I will save them.
It is Hana's duty.

rows.label: bf04370130_0090
rows.name: I'm glad[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf04370130_0095
rows.name: Now I have one thing left to do...

rows.label: bf04370130_0100
rows.name: Hana...

rows.label: bf04370130_0105
rows.name: Use me as a starter[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf04370130_0110
rows.name: That's right!

rows.label: bf04370130_0120
rows.name: Hana's ether furnace...

rows.label: bf04370130_0125
rows.name:
Using experimental ether furnace from Kiku,
it can be fully ignited!

rows.label: bf04370130_0130
rows.name: Nee-sama[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf04370130_0140
rows.name: Will Kiku be okay doing something like that?

rows.label: bf04370130_0150
rows.name: It's the least I can do to atone[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf04370130_0155
rows.name: Use the flames of my life...to save them...
